A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not as bad as some of the die hards suggested.  I actually liked the arc or the plot for Luke and Leia.  Lots of fluff for the younger/newer Star Wars fans.  Only real complaint was that there were some obvious USC film school moments where the dialogue explained the action - instead of just doing it!  I think Kylo Ren won a lot of bad guy points in this one and really outshines the horrible pre-qual Annakin Skywalker super weenie stuff.  Go see it!
